Text: Already blocking 745314263 IPs and remember schedule PG2 for windows startup

Actually there is 5 versions of PeerGuardian 2 for Windows and it's 100% free software

1) PeerGuardian 2 for Windows 98/ME
2) PeerGuardian 2 for Windows 2000/XP/2003
3) PeerGuardian 2 for Windows XP/2003 x64 Edition
4) PeerGuardian Lite for Windows 2000/XP/2003
5) PeerGuardian Lite for Windows XP/2003 x64 Edition

http://phoenixlabs.org
